    public abstract class ConfigurableOutEdges<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
implements OutEdges<I,E>
    Common base class for OutEdges implementations that require a configuration.
